patthana16.40:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.40:0.3_0: proceeding in line with the teaching.
patthana16.40:1.1_0: There is no basis for the path that gives rise to the support. Form is a condition for the sake of the path.
patthana16.40:2.1_0: Nor does one not give rise to the precept or the path for the sake of thought.
